item.title: How I lost a Day to OpenMPI Being Mental
item.description: So at Glasgow Uni we have this little cluster for the maths department which happens to including about ten machines set up to work with torque (a job scheduling system). I discovered that these machines hadn’t had anything run on them for literally months, what a waste of resources! To rectify this atrocity I decided to try and run my MPI enabled code on all ten machines. Problem One Turns out two of the machines have eight cores and the other eight have twelve cores.
